alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 9:08PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Vernon Parish through 945 PM CDT... At 908 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Anacoco, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leesville, Anacoco, Fort Polk, Slagle, New Llano, Hornbeck, Simpson and Pickering. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
